MAKE MONEY LAYING FAVORITE HORSES - RECESSION PROOF WAY OF EARNING INCOME!

*******************************************************************************************************

Horse racing is a marvellous sport and one enjoyed by zillions of people. Considered a game of skill, some of us follow horse racing for the sheer thrill of it but for most people it is all about the betting.

Horse race betting is not as complicated as some people would want you to believe. With the advent of online betting exchanges you can also take on the role of a bookmaker by lay betting - betting that a horse won't win the race!

In this course, we'll teach you all the basics you need to know about horse race betting and provide a step-by-step guide to identify false favourites to lay and make money. This strategy will involve using an online betting exchange for UK Horse Races.

The course is structured into 3 key sections:

  1. In the 1st section, we will explain the basics of betting including backing, laying and understanding odds and other key terms used in horse race betting
  2. In the 2nd section, we will discuss laying horses in detail and show you how to identify losing favourites using key parameters
  3. In the 3rd and final section, we will show you how to lay horses at the right price and maximize your profits

Course duration: Approx. 1 hour

Course material: Videos + Downloadable Excel Sheets
